desc:
65% all parameters and 30% critical rate (Light, Dark), 0-150% Atk relative to remaining HP, 250% critical damage & adds HP absorption to attack
Guild Raid: Add to UBB 3 turns DoT infliction & fully fills BB gauge when damage dealt is over 50k
lore:
A hypercharged device harnessing the dual powers of light and darkness. The contraption hums at a rather ominous frequency, like that of a rumbling steel beast.
Having equipped the new gizmos with new modules, greater emphasis was placed on 'hypercharging' the user's latent energies. The resulting test runs have been a rousing success, though some users report their hair standing on end for days afterward.
name: Hypercharge Gizmo
